System.M_MENUGRP001: SELECT M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUGRP_NAME, M.MENUGRP_HELP, M.MENUGRP_SEQ FROM M_MENUGRP AS M ORDER BY M.MENUGRP_SEQ
System.M_MENUGRP002: SELECT M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUGRP_NAME, M.MENUGRP_HELP, M.MENUGRP_SEQ FROM M_MENUGRP AS M INNER JOIN M_EXECTL1 AS ME1 ON M.MENUGRP_CODE = ME1.MENUGRP_CODE WHERE M.MENUGRP_NAME DIF_TAG '' AND M.MENUGRP_CODE DIF_TAG '000' AND ME1.USERID = ? ORDER BY M.MENUGRP_SEQ
System.M_MENUGRP003: SELECT M.MENUGRP_CODE, M.MENUGRP_NAME, M.MENUGRP_HELP, M.MENUGRP_SEQ, COALESCE(ME1.CONTROL_TYPE, 0) AS CONTROL_TYPE FROM M_MENUGRP AS M LEFT JOIN M_EXECTL1 AS ME1 ON M.MENUGRP_CODE = ME1.MENUGRP_CODE AND ME1.USERID = ? TAG_WHERE ORDER BY MENUGRP_CODE
